channel.title: Jack Mallers on ₿itcoin Transcripts
channel.description: Recent content in Jack Mallers on ₿itcoin Transcripts

item.title: Lightning & Identity, Olympus and Zap
item.description: podcast: https://stephanlivera.com/episode/120/ Stephan Livera: Jack, welcome to the show, man. Jack Mallers: Stephan, thank you for having me. I’m a big fan. Stephan Livera: I’m a big fan of you. I really like what your family’s doing, you know, Bitcoinmom and your dad @willbc20. I can’t remember his exact handle. And then obviously you guys are just killing it. I’m a big fan. Zap is my favorite wallet, so I really love using it and yeah, I’m really looking forward to just chatting with you about Zap and you know what you’re doing as well.
